name: Be the Backpack
description:
This game was made in 9 days for the Godot Wild Jam #33.

You are the backpack on the back of a hero on their journey. It is your job to keep them alive by managing their inventory and equipment. Travel through the island of Yutan, trekking through the deserts and fighting Frost Giants near Lonely Hearth.

Made in Godot v3.2.3
